players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I'm clean, discuss alibis. Be careful Charlie."
You: "I support Bob, no alibi conflict here. Keep an eye on Charlie."
Charlie: "Investigating results show Bob is the mafioso. Watch him closely."
Charlie: "Bob, stay cautious. I know your role. Alice, keep an eye on him too."
Bob: "Alibi checks out, watch Charlie. Villagers unite."
You: "Alice: Investigating Bob and Charlie. Stay vigilant."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested

Charlie: "Bob, stay cautious. I know your role. Alice, keep an eye on him too."
You: "Alibi checks out, watch Charlie. Villagers unite."
Alice: "Alice: Investigating Bob and Charlie. Stay vigilant."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested
